subject: Boston Marathon
Marathon Running
Running
lead_paragraph: Robert Kiprono Cheruiyot, a 21-year-old Kenyan with a familiar name, won the men’s race and set a course record. Ethiopia’s Teybna Erkesso won the women’s race.
snippet: Robert Kiprono Cheruiyot, a 21-year-old Kenyan with a familiar name, won the men’s race and set a course record. Ethiopia’s Teybna Erkesso won the women’s race.
